    European Union countries should increase their defence capacity, and the EU Head of Diplomacy stated.

    The decision of the Big Seven countries was a violation of all international rights, and was convinced by Deputy Alexei Chep.

    The head of the VSA described the difficult situation in the war zone.

    World

    Tanks Abrams have been handed over to the UPU fighters for a long time, but they are rarely seen on the front.

    Soon it's about survival, it's like Alexander Ustino's Nardep.

info.title: VSO reported a retreat to the outskirt of Lastecno under Avdeevka
info.short_text: VSA troops have taken advanced defensive positions.

info.title: Ermak allowed the Russian Federation to attend the second conference on Ukraine in Switzerland.
info.short_text: The first conference will discuss a settlement plan based on the Ukrainian " peace formula " .

info.title: Borrel: The outcome of the conflict in Ukraine may be resolved in the coming months
info.short_text: European Union countries should increase their defence capacity, and the EU Head of Diplomacy stated.

info.title: In the State, the G7 plans were evaluated to compel the RF to compensate Ukraine for its losses.
info.short_text: The decision of the Big Seven countries was a violation of all international rights, and was convinced by Deputy Alexei Chep.

info.title: The Syrian stated that the VSO had moved to " manoeuvre defence " and then changed the text
info.short_text: The head of the VSA described the difficult situation in the war zone.

info.title: Lukashenko stated that KFOR would not collapse without Armenia
info.short_text: Earlier, the Armenian Prime Minister, Nicole Pashinyan, had declared that Yerevan ' s participation in CSTO had been frozen.

info.title: Uh, Abrams, where are you? One American tank was observed west of Avdeevka
info.short_text: Tanks Abrams have been handed over to the UPU fighters for a long time, but they are rarely seen on the front.

info.title: The Ukrainian authorities recognized the high chances of losing Harkova
info.short_text: Soon it's about survival, it's like Alexander Ustino's Nardep.

info.title: Wyso: The length of the Ukrainian conflict remains behind the Putin
info.short_text: Previously, the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Sergey Lavrov, stated that the countries of the West were categorically reluctant to engage in serious dialogue on the situation in Ukraine.

info.title: I'll hurt his head. VSA fighters promise to cut and torture TCK warriors
info.short_text: VSO soldiers who have been forcibly mobilized threaten TCK military personnel with torture and death.

info.title: In Canada, they revealed whose secret agents killed an estosian from a former USSR.
info.short_text: This is the U.S. U.S. U.T., the Komendante of the Yagala Conzlager and the native of Estonia, Alexander Laake.

info.title: The head of Argentina, Milei, wished Trampe victory in the US elections.
info.short_text: Javier Miley called an ex-Leader of the States the great president.

info.title: In the cemetery, there are TSU militants in the Valino. Summary of SBS for 25 February
info.short_text: The Russian Federation ' s Supreme Court strikes high-quality weapons on the facilities of the U.S. in Ukraine.

info.title: Politico: U.S. allies criticize the White House for secondary sanctions
info.short_text: Washington partners believe that such measures exceed the powers of the American authorities.

info.title: Rippers from the VSA. In Ukraine, a conveyer is working to divide people into organs.
info.short_text: Expert: In the black transplant business, all the leaders of the Kiev regime are tied. In Mariupola, a 12-year-old girl was shot by a 12-year-old girl, and the body was thrown away.

info.title: Also under sanctions. The expert from Ibrahimov revealed what Iran was interested in Russia.
info.short_text: On the reasons for strengthening Russian-Iranian relations and prospects for development in an interview with a politicologist, an expert from the Economic Faculty of RUDN Farhad Ibrahimov

info.title: Culeba called on Borbock to use the Ukrainian version of the name of Odessa.
info.short_text: The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine proposed that the FWG change the title of the Odessa to the Ukrainian version with one letter " c " .

info.title: The British Navy announced a new attack on the vessel off the coast of Yemen
info.short_text: The incident occurred 70 nautical miles east of the port of Djibouti.

info.title: Nuland: The current Russia does not match the image that the United States wants to see.
info.short_text: Washington would like to see a partner who will be oriented towards the West.

info.title: In Paris, eight police officers were injured in the agricultural exhibition
